 155: # Below, multiply with B_NUM is the average in space.
 156: # Every box is macroscopically of size 1/B_NUM
 157: # Divide with DIM_BOX is because of the Riemann integral:
 158: # \int \xi^n(x)f(x) = \sum_x n^{-2} \xi^n(x) f(x)
